titles.title: United States Statue of Liberty $1 Coin Act of 1998
To require the design of the obverse side of the $1 coin to depict the Statue of Liberty.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services

bill.summary: 7/24/1998--Introduced. United States Statue of Liberty $1 Coin Act of 1998 - Amends Federal currency law to require the obverse side of the $1 coin to have a design depicting the Statue of Liberty.
